constraints.name: subset_constraint
constraints.description: 选取的卡片必须是给定卡片集合的子集
constraints.formal: S ⊆ C, where S is the subset and C is the set of given cards

constraints.name: distinctness
constraints.description: 选取的卡片必须互不相同
constraints.formal: ∀i, j ∈ S, i ≠ j → c_i ≠ c_j

constraints.name: set_constraint
constraints.description: 三张卡片构成一个集合当且仅当它们在每个特征上要么完全相同，要么完全不同
constraints.formal: ∀f ∈ {1, 2, ..., k}, (c_{i,f} = c_{j,f} = c_{k,f}) ∨ (c_{i,f}, c_{j,f}, c_{k,f} are pairwise distinct)

constraints.name: meta_set_constraint
constraints.description: 五张卡片构成一个元集合当且仅当其中存在多于一个的集合
constraints.formal: ∃S1, S2 ⊆ M, |S1| = |S2| = 3, S1 ≠ S2, both S1 and S2 are sets
